entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
